definition: having an overabundance of flesh, excess bodily weight, make fat or plump
details:
adjective
- having an overabundance of flesh
= example: having an overabundance of flesh
- containing or composed of fat
= example: containing or composed of fat
= synonyms: fatty
- marked by great fruitfulness
= synonyms: rich
- lucrative
= synonyms: juicy
- having a relatively large diameter
= example: having a relatively large diameter
noun
- excess bodily weight
= example: excess bodily weight
= synonyms: fatness, blubber, avoirdupois
- a kind of body tissue containing stored fat that serves as a source of energy
= synonyms: adipose tissue, fatty tissue
- a soft greasy substance occurring in organic tissue and consisting of a mixture of lipids (mostly triglycerides)
= example: a soft greasy substance occurring in organic tissue and consisting of a mixture of lipids (mostly triglycerides)
verb
- make fat or plump
= synonyms: plump
